content: SÃ©bastien and Yury, since you seem to be around, do you want to discuss #3627? I don't mind changing the API if you have a clear idea about that.
But I'd like to move forward, this has been blocking the sphere eversion project for a pretty long time (long before I opened the PR).

I had a go trying to define paths as structures with data, and it went pretty well. I pushed to your branch, you can keep or discard what you want. Doc is not ready, I will add it if you agree with the approach. But not today, it is too late.
It seems very close to what I had a couple of iterations ago, so if you like it then it's fine. I'm a bit uneasy about calling restrict something that changes the target of a map.
Or we can add path.cod_restrict instead and use it in joined_in.joined.
@Sebastien Gouezel I see you replace all my "source" and "target" by "left" and "right" that seem less descriptive to me. Is this something you think is important?
No, I'll put source and target back while adressing Yury's comments.

Except that I've just seen that you have already adressed his comments. So, feel free to change back to source or target, or I'll do it. Tell me when you're done with your changes, we shouldn't be working on the branch at the same time!
If you want to work now then it's perfect for me.
